subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: A World Golf Hall of Famer and former No. 1, Bernhard Langer has one hole in his résumé at 53: he has never won a British Open.
snippet: A World Golf Hall of Famer and former No. 1, Bernhard Langer has one hole in his résumé at 53: he has never won a British Open.
